item.title: UGC Content Creator/Photographer for Growing Brand - Upwork
item.description:
Our growing food-based brand in New York City is seeking a professional UGC Content Creator. Your role will be integral to our growth on TikTok and Instagram.  

The UGC Creator will film and edit engaging and entertaining short—and long-form videos showcasing our Sugar Artistry for Instagram and TikTok. We also ship Artisanal cake jars and dry cookie mixes nationwide.

The photographer will create lifestyle product images across our social media platform.

The UGC  will develop high-quality content for our social media platforms. To do so, they will learn all about our branding and style guide, and contributions to it significantly maximize the impact of the content they generate efficiently. Must have a portfolio that we can review

We will ship our products to you—no PO Box! Some of our products are perishable.  We seek to hire 4-5 UGC Content Creators between now and September. The content will be used for the fall.

Please do not apply to this job post, and then message me to offer a $2k to 4k package. I will report you to Upwork.

The work will start in August 2024.


Budget: $125
Posted On: June 30, 2024 21:24 UTC
Category: Video Production
Skills:M4V, MOV, How To, Video Commercial, Testimonial Video, Promotional Video, Social Media Marketing, Marketing Strategy, Instagram, Facebook
Skills: M4V, MOV, How To, Video Commercial, Testimonial Video, Promotional Video, Social Media Marketing, Marketing Strategy, Instagram, Facebook
Location Requirement: Only freelancers located in the United States may apply.
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: Video Spokesperson - Green Screen - Upwork
item.description:
Seeking a video spokesperson to deliver a friendly and casual explainer video for a local financial institution.

We're looking for someone who can film and record themselves in front of a green screen.

Client is a bank. The topic will be to explain the lending process and related steps to loan applicants.

Script will be provided: there is approximately 1 minute 45 seconds of content.

The video spokesperson we hire must film themselves on a green screen and provide us the video files. We will edit and mix the video.

Multiple takes are expected.

Client will have perpetual rights to use the video on their website. The video will be available to consumers visiting the client's website as they research how to apply for a loan.

Video will not be used for paid promotion.

We're looking for a female spokesperson who is friendly and conversational.

We will define a basic outfit (for instance: business casual blazer with white shirt). We may send the talent a client-branded shirt (such as an embroidered polo).

Budget: $1,000
Posted On: June 30, 2024 21:18 UTC
Category: Acting
Skills:US English Dialect, Female, Explainer Video, Green Screen
Skills: US English Dialect, Female, Explainer Video, Green Screen
Location Requirement: Only freelancers located in the United States may apply.
Country: United States
click to apply
